title: Power BI Service Update, Offline, SharePoint 2016 - Roundup #38
excerpt: #PowerBI Service Update, Offline, SharePoint 2016 - Roundup #38  In this roundup, I highlight the Power BI Service Updates, mobile updates including offline capabilities, a documentation survey for Microsoft SQL Server 2016, the fact that SharePoint 2016 just went RTM and a creative way to make reports
